pages.title: Stack
pages.text: Multiblock (top->bottom): refinery_tower x4, then the refinery base. Set any firebox directly under the refinery—electric, standard, or oil. Heat-driven only; no motor needed.

pages.title: IO
pages.text: Feed crude/fluid into the side with the firebox input; outputs leave the opposite face or ports. Pipe outputs to storage quickly to avoid backing up the tower. Great upstream of chemical/digester chains.

pages.name: Refinery Stack
pages.text: Four tower segments above the base (zero), with any firebox directly underneath. Visualize to check alignment—the preview uses the electric firebox but standard/oil fireboxes also work.
